ogTitle: leaked phone call: did the president break the law? - smarther news
ogDescription: president trump accused georgia election officials of not adequately looking into alleged voter fraud in the 2020 election. georgia officials refute these accusations. here's the big picture on this developing story.
summary: President Trump accused Georgia election officials of not adequately looking into alleged voter fraud in the 2020 election. Georgia officials refute these accusations. Here’s the big picture on this developing story.
